summary: During their nightly poker game, a group of lowlifes are terrorized in their own convenience store by a masked killer.
cast: Steve Guttenberg|James Duval|Liz Nicole Abrams|Peter Story|Eduardo Antonio Garcia|Ellia English|David Jean Thomas|David Basila|Rolando Boyce|Alexander Yurchikov|Josiah Trager|Annie McKnight|Mark Laing|Marie Rowe|Darrin Grimwood|John Bonilla|Stephanie Paris|Jod Soraci|Saskia Boedt|Alan Noel Vega|Roger C. Ambrose|Jeramy Felch|Christopher Guara
title: Cornered!
